text: Red sparrow may refer to: * Red fox sparrow (Passerella iliaca iliaca), a group of subspecies of the North American fox sparrow * Red Sparrow (novel), a 2013 U.S. spy novel by Jason Matthews * Red Sparrow, 2018 U.S. spy film based on the eponymous novel * Red Sparowes, a U.S. post-rock band * Red Sparrow, a fictional character created by Charles Bukowski from the 1994 novel Pulp (novel) * Red Sparrow, a 2010 play by Manav Kaul ==See also== * Red (disambiguation) * Sparrow (disambiguation)
title: Red sparrow
